sentences.en: A small bird fluttered past the window.
sentences.cn: 一只小鸟拍打着翅膀飞过窗前。

sentences.en: Atrial fibrillation is much more common than atrial flutter.
sentences.cn: 心房纤颤比心房扑动更为常见.

sentences.en: Carotid sinus pressure has little or no effect on the atrial rate in atrial flutter.
sentences.cn: 压迫颈动脉窦对心房扑动时的心房率几乎不起作用.

sentences.en: Dead leaves fluttered slowly to the ground.
He immediately partook of his mother's anxiety and fell into a great flutter.
sentences.cn: 他立即分担了他母亲的焦虑,陷入一种极端张惶失措之中.

sentences.en: Her eyelids fluttered but did not open.
sentences.cn: 她的眼皮动了一下，但眼睛没有睁开。

sentences.en: Her heart began to flutter with fear.
sentences.cn: 她的心因害怕而开始怦怦跳.

sentences.en: His arrival put the girls in a flutter.
sentences.cn: 他的到来使她心绪不宁.

sentences.en: I had a flutter on five horses.
sentences.cn: 我在5匹马身上下了小赌注。

sentences.en: Our surprise attack put the enemy into a flutter.
sentences.cn: 我们的奇袭使敌人张皇失措.

sentences.en: She had found it well to flutter ahead.
sentences.cn: 她发觉最好的办法是曲线前进.

sentences.en: That TV play caused a mild flutter among the viewers.
sentences.cn: 那出电视剧在观众中稍稍引起轰动.

sentences.en: The flag fluttered in the light breeze.
The look in his eyes made my heart flutter.
sentences.cn: 他的眼神让我心里扑通扑通直跳。

sentences.en: The news caused a flutter among the teaching staff.
sentences.cn: 这个消息在全体教师中引起了不安.

sentences.en: They unfurled the flag and let it flutter in the wind.
sentences.cn: 他们将旗展开让其迎风招展.

sentences.en: This was the Angel of History! We felt its wings flutter through the room.
sentences.cn: 这真是历史的天使降临了! 我们感到她在我们房间里振翅鼓翼的声音.

sentences.en: Unknown birds flutter round the skirts of that forest.
sentences.cn: 叫不出名字的鸟儿在森林四周振翅飞翔.

phrases.tran_cn: [口语](在证券交易市场或赛马场)参加小赌

trans.tran_cn: 紧张，激动不安，颤振，飘扬，（身体部分的）病态阵跳
trans.tran_en: a feeling of being nervous, confused, or excited
if a bird or insect flutters, or if it flutters its wings, it flies by moving its wings lightly up and down

trans.tran_cn: 振翼，颤动，(心脏)不规则跳动
trans.tran_en: if your heart or your stomach flutters, you feel very excited or nervous
if your eyelids flutter, they move slightly when you are asleep

trans.tran_cn: 振翼，拍翅膀，烦扰，坐立不安，（旗帜）飘扬
